title: Navigation shortcuts in Power BI
excerpt: Marry Christmas and happy new year!!  In today's video I am going to show you how to navigate in Power BI without using your mouse!!  Here you can download all the pbix files: https://curbal.com/donwload-center  SUBSCRIBE to learn more about Power and Excel BI! https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCJ7UhloHSA4wAqPzyi6TOkw?sub_confirmation=1
